releaseNotes: This release contains the following products and updates for CentOS7 and SL6: &nbsp;<br><br><ul><li>dCache 5.2.16 - see release notes for details https://www.dcache.org/downloads/1.9/release-notes-5.2.shtml</li><li>dmlite 1.13.2 - various bug fixes and improvements http://lcgdm.web.cern.ch/dmlitedpm-1132-released-epel</li><li>xroot 4.11.2 - variuos bug fixes https://github.com/xrootd/xrootd/blob/v4.11.2/docs/ReleaseNotes.txt</li><li>cvmfs 2.7.1 - bugfixes and improvements https://cvmfs.readthedocs.io/en/2.7/cpt-releasenotes.html</li><li>gfal2 2.17.2 - bugfixes and improvements https://dmc.web.cern.ch/release/gfal2-2172</li><li>Nagios probes for ARGUS - first release</li><li>Nagios probes for onedata - first release</li><li>Nagios probes for webdav - first release</li></ul>

changeLog: This release contains the following products and updates for CentOS7 and SL6: &nbsp;<br><br><ul><li>dCache 5.2.16 - see release notes for details https://www.dcache.org/downloads/1.9/release-notes-5.2.shtml</li><li>dmlite 1.13.2 - various bug fixes and improvements http://lcgdm.web.cern.ch/dmlitedpm-1132-released-epel</li><li>xroot 4.11.2 - variuos bug fixes https://github.com/xrootd/xrootd/blob/v4.11.2/docs/ReleaseNotes.txt</li><li>cvmfs 2.7.1 - bugfixes and improvements https://cvmfs.readthedocs.io/en/2.7/cpt-releasenotes.html</li><li>gfal2 2.17.2 - bugfixes and improvements https://dmc.web.cern.ch/release/gfal2-2172</li><li>Nagios probes for ARGUS - first release</li><li>Nagios probes for onedata - first release</li><li>Nagios probes for webdav - first release</li></ul>

products.name: arc.arc6
products.description:
The Advanced Resource Connector (ARC) middleware is an Open Source software
solution to enable distributed computing infrastructures with the emphasis
on processing large volumes of data. ARC provides an abstraction layer over
computational resources, complete with input and output data movement
functionalities. The security model of ARC is identical to that of Grid
solutions, relying on delegation of user credentials and the concept of
Virtual Organisations. ARC also provides client tools, as well as API in C++,
Python and Java

products.name: cernvm.cvmfs
products.description: CernVM File System (CernVM-FS) is a network file system based on HTTP and optimized to deliver experiment software in a fast, scalable, and reliable way. Files and file metadata are aggressively cached and downloaded on demand. Thereby the CernVM-FS decouples the life cycle management of the application software releases from the operating system. CernVM-FS is included in CernVM, however it can also be used outside CernVM.

products.name: cernvm.egi-config
products.description: Configuration file for the egi-cvmfs services.

products.name: dcache.dcache
products.description: dCache provides system for storing and retrieving huge amounts of data, distributed among a large number of heterogenous server nodes, under a single virtual filesystem tree with a variety of standard access methods.

products.name: dpm.dmlite
products.description: DMLite is a plugin-based C++ framework that gives functionality for namespace management, pool management and i/o access.This is at the heart of the DPM, LFC and Dynamic Federations projects, together with the other DPM backends and frontends.

products.name: egi.nagios-probe-argus
products.description: Nagios probes for monitoring Argus services

products.name: egi.nagios-probe-onedata
products.description: Nagios probes for monitoring Argus services

products.name: egi.nagios-probe-webdav
products.description: Nagios probes for monitoring Argus services

products.name: gfal2.gfal2
products.description: GFAL (Grid File Access Library ) is a C library providing an abstraction layer of the grid storage system complexity.
